text: Darryl Gerard "D. J." Augustin, Jr. (born November 10, 1987 in New Orleans, Louisiana) is an American professional basketball player. He plays for the Orlando Magic of the NBA. He played point guard for the University of Texas Longhorns from 2006 to 2008. He was drafted ninth overall by the Charlotte Bobcats of the National Basketball Association in 2008. Augustin is listed as 6'0" (1.83 m) by the NBA but stands 5'11" (1.78 m) barefoot according to the 2008 pre-draft measurements.DraftExpress: Pre Draft Measurements ==References== ==Other websites== * * Profile at TexasSports.com Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:African-American basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:Charlotte Bobcats players Category:Chicago Bulls players Category:Denver Nuggets players Category:Detroit Pistons players Category:Houston Rockets players Category:Indiana Pacers players Category:Los Angeles Lakers players Category:Oklahoma City Thunder players Category:Orlando Magic players Category:Point guards Category:Sportspeople from New Orleans Category:Toronto Raptors players
title: D. J. Augustin
